Author: littlestpeach
Text: Ty for this reminder, I really appreciate it

Author: mal31_
Text: Remind yourself how different your situations are. Remember that it’s not a competition to have it worse than someone or be functioning the same as someone else even if you’re worse off. Remind yourself that you are worthy of quality life, and that you are willing to claw and bite and yell and fight to make it to that life. You owe it to yourself.
